file_content.text: Visit a destination where fortunes are made each and every day!
There's only one place where you're guaranteed to meet with the galaxy's elite.
Book your next vacation at the Star Cluster Casino!
Tired of living the life of a chump?
The life of a high roller is waiting--for you!
One destination extravagant enough to live up to your lavish lifestyle.
Club Vertica--the galaxy's most refined casino.
Why wait? Book your next visit today!
Sick of pinching each and every credit?
